verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"On the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H259><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> you shall set <S%H6965><s%> up the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%>
"And you shall place <S%H7760><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and you shall screen <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> with the veil. <S%H6532><s%>

"And you shall bring <S%H935><s%> in the table <S%H7979><s%> and arrange <S%H6186><s%> what <S%H6187><s%> belongs <S%H6187><s%> on it; and you shall bring <S%H935><s%> in the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> and mount <S%H5927><s%> its lamps. <S%H5216><s%>

"Moreover, you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> up the veil <S%H4539><s%> for the doorway <S%H6607><s%> to the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

"And you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

"And you shall set <S%H5414><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in it.

"And you shall set <S%H7760><s%> up the court <S%H2691><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> and hang <S%H5414><s%> up the veil <S%H4539><s%> for the gateway <S%H8179><s%> of the court. <S%H2691><s%>

"Then you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is in it, and shall consecrate <S%H6942><s%> it and all <S%H3605><s%> its furnishings; <S%H3627><s%> and it shall be holy. <S%H6944><s%>

"And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its utensils, <S%H3627><s%> and consecrate <S%H6942><s%> the altar; <S%H4196><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>
"And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> and its stand, <S%H3653><s%> and consecrate <S%H6942><s%> it.

"Then you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> to the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

"And you shall put <S%H3847><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> on Aaron <S%H175><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> him and consecrate <S%H6942><s%> him, that he may minister <S%H3547><s%> as a priest <S%H3547><s%> to Me.
"And you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> tunics <S%H3801><s%> on them;

and you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> them even <S%H9201><s%> as you have anointed <S%H4886><s%> their father, that they may minister <S%H1><s%> as priests <S%H3547><s%> to Me; and their anointing <S%H3547><s%> shall qualify <S%H4888><s%> them for a perpetual <S%H1961><s%> priesthood <S%H5769><s%> throughout their generations. <S%H3550><s%> "
Thus Moses <S%H4872><s%> did; <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, so <S%H3651><s%> he did. <S%H6213><s%>

Now it came <S%H1961><s%> about in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was erected. <S%H6965><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> erected <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and laid <S%H5414><s%> its sockets, <S%H134><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> up its boards, <S%H7175><s%> and inserted <S%H5414><s%> its bars <S%H1280><s%> and erected <S%H6965><s%> its pillars. <S%H5982><s%>

And he spread <S%H6566><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> on top <S%H4605><s%> of it, just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Then he took <S%H3947><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> [it] into the ark, <S%H727><s%> and attached <S%H7760><s%> the poles <S%H905><s%> to the ark, <S%H727><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat <S%H3727><s%> on top <S%H4605><s%> of the ark. <S%H727><s%>

And he brought <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> into the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> up a veil <S%H6532><s%> for the screen, <S%H4539><s%> and screened <S%H5526><s%> off <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Then he put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the veil. <S%H6532><s%>

And he set <S%H6186><s%> the arrangement <S%H6187><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> on it before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Then he placed <S%H7760><s%> the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> opposite <S%H5227><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>
And he lighted <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
Then he placed <S%H7760><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of the veil; <S%H6532><s%>
and he burned <S%H6999><s%> fragrant <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on it, just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
Then he set <S%H7760><s%> up the veil <S%H4539><s%> for the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And he set <S%H7760><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> [before] the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> on it the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> and the meal <S%H4503><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he placed <S%H7760><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in it for washing. <S%H7364><s%>
And from it Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> washed <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet. <S%H7272><s%>

When they entered <S%H935><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and when they approached <S%H7126><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> they washed, <S%H7364><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he erected <S%H6965><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and hung <S%H5414><s%> up the veil <S%H4539><s%> for the gateway <S%H8179><s%> of the court. <S%H2691><s%> Thus Moses <S%H4872><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> the work. <S%H4399><s%>

Then the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was not able <S%H3201><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> had settled <S%H7931><s%> on it, and the glory <S%H9202><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And throughout all <S%H3605><s%> their journeys <S%H4550><s%> whenever the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken <S%H5927><s%> up from over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> would set <S%H5265><s%> out;
but if <S%H518><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was not taken <S%H5927><s%> up, then they did not set <S%H5265><s%> out until <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> when it was taken <S%H5927><s%> up.

For throughout all <S%H3605><s%> their journeys, <S%H4550><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was on the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> and there was fire <S%H784><s%> in it by night, <S%H3915><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
